Forecast, tomorrow's technology, today

A smart combination of several forecasts performs better than the best of its members.

— EWEA Wind Power Forecasting Workshop. Rotterdam 2013

Vortex FORECAST uses an combination of up to 36 different algorithm in an attempt to deliver the best forecast current technology can provide. Even if you already have a forecast provider, Vortex atractive prices make FORECAST a perfect complement to increase your predictions performance.

Vortex FORECAST is based on a 3rd generation forecast approach: while pioneer prediction schemes (based on downscale-modeling) were outperformed by simpler second generation ones (based on statistical training only), Vortex approach takes the best of the two worlds introducing a new combined scheme that has demonstrated to improve forecast quality.

NEW! Check our accuracy against Sotavento real-time measurements, on-line. Simply, log in as usual and open FORECAST Sample.
